casebody.data:
CROSSTEX ENERGY SERVICES, LP, et al.
v.
TEXAS BRINE COMPANY, LLC, et al. No. 2018-CC-1128 Supreme Court of Louisiana. October 29, 2018 ON SUPERVISORY WRIT TO THE 23 RD JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT, PARISH OF ASSUMPTION PER CURIAM

Writ granted. Finding there are genuine issues of material fact still in dispute, we set aside the district court's ruling which granted Occidental Chemical Corporation's motion for partial summary judgment and dismissed Texas Brine Company's fraud-based claims. This matter is remanded to the district court for further proceedings.
